changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE email ( id BIGINT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, uuid VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL, `sender` VARCHAR(256), `receiver` VARCHAR(256), bcc VARCHAR(256), subject VARCHAR(256), content VARCHAR(256), status VARCHAR(256), updated_by VARCHAR(256), created_by BIGINT, updated_at TIMESTAMP, created_at TIMESTAMP, is_deleted TINYINT );
